alert.note: Alert for Upper Lafourche (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 2:26PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Lafourche Parish through 300 PM CDT... At 226 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mathews, or 11 miles northwest of Larose, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lockport, Mathews, Des Allemands, Raceland and Bayou Gauche. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
